title: ghaTikAcaladi ninta
sahitya:
ghaTikAcala ninta shrI hanumanta


anupallavi

  ghaTikAcaladi ninta paTu hanumantana paThaneya mAdalutkaTadi porevanendu


caraNam 1    catura yugadi tAnu mukhya prANanu catura mukanayyana catura mUrutigaLanu 
caturatanadi bhajisi catur mukhanAgi jagake caturvidha bala koDuda
    caraNam 2    sarasija bhavagOsuga kalmaSa dUra vara cakra tIrtta sara meravAcaladi 
nittya naraharigedurAgi sthira yOgAsanadi karedu varagaLa koDuda
    caraNam 3    shankha cakrava dharisi bhaktara manah-pangava pariharisi pankajanAbha 
shrI purandara viTTalana binkada sEvaka sankaTa kaLeyuta
